website_summaries.verdict: This laceless, no-welt design is gentler on your hands than styles with laces.
pros: Fill value is mounted to its own panel for balance
cons: If the bag loses air, be sure to coat needle tip with petroleum jelly when you add air

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for something that says special, look no further. This bag has a definite "hand made" quality. Does this company care? I think so. None of my other speed bags came with 2 page inflation instructions. It is a word to the wise. Once inflated, the bag takes on the perfect teardrop shape ( pear shape?)---The needle insertion point is more defined than any of the other (Chinese made) bags that I own. This one sets the standard. Made in USA??? Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.author: danf415

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, heavy, slow.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it looked nice. Noticed some warping of the leather from improer storage at a closer glance. More importantly I put it up and it's obnoxiously weighty, leathers too thick and the bladder seems lifeless. I bought this to replace my worn out pro Mex title bag as a step up, but I didn't know how good I had it. If you want a speed bag that feels like a heavy bag, this is it. If you want something for speed, get the new title Mex bag v 2.0
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rickman

customer_reviews.title: great speedbag
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best speed bag i've owned ... i have used boxing to work out for years (30+) ... had a variety of speed bags mostly from a different major boxing company ... it's not cheap but i hope to not have to buy another for a decade (they won't last forever) ... NEARLY perfectly balanced so it's easy to use and get a good rhythm going ... follow the detailed instructions and you won't have any issues ... very much recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, I've been using speed bags for many years and this is easily my favorite one. I purchased the small bag and have been using it for a little more than a month and it has been extremely reliable. It has a great rebound, is very durable, and it won't chew up your hands. I will definitely be buying more boxing equipment from Balazs. It is more than worth the price and its a million times better than the garbage that everlast makes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. It rebounds predictably and is quite fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It rebounds predictably and is quite fast. It seems to be very well put together and done with no laces to upset the balance. I like it sop much I purchased the medium and the extra small. They all are great speed bags. I am looking forward to many hours of hitting them, Buy one and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BaggericTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: The Balazs Lazer Speed Bag is one of the best purchases I have made in regards to boxing hardware. These bags are well made, responsive, and FAST. If you want a good speed bag experience that really takes your hand and eye coordination to the next level, then you have found the right bag to compliment your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grubb

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Quality Speed Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Balazs did not disappoint with the design of this bag. The outer shell is smooth to where handwraps aren’t necessary. There are no laces to throw off the bag’s balance. The loop is solid ensuring a good seat on a swivel. The bladder is not replaceable, but that shouldn’t be a concern as long as you follow instructions and refrain from over inflating the bag. This bag is a bit more expensive than other brands, but you get what you pay for when it comes to boxing equipment. If you’re looking for a quality speed bag, pick up the Balazs Lazer. You’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Speed Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it, so I cannot comment on longterm durability. I like the larger size, and the high quality leather is thick and supple. It was worth spending the extra money on it. Makes the other bag I have from a well-known brand look like a child's toy. The Balazs is heavier and loads of fun to work out with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Henry A. Meinig

customer_reviews.title: Great speed bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bag, regardless of the inflation monitoring. The leather is a great quality and the bladder seems consistent throughout the bag, not allowing any internal vibrations. The symmetry is great and the sound is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Curasi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have other speed bags and they seem to be either slow and heavy or light and fast. This speed bag is fast and heavy. Easily the best speed bag that I've ever owned. It hasn't popped yet but it leaks air and needs to be topped off once a week. You must use Vaseline

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and responsive bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable bag I have ever used. The leather is soft and the bag is responsive. Although I wouldn’t recommend doing so on a regular basis, I used the bag for a little while without wraps with no negative effects. New to the brand and extremely satisfied.

At first I was a little bothered by the shipping cost, but it arrived in two days and came with a pressure gauge (which if bought alone costs more than the shipping cost for the bag) that is very accurate and has a pressure release button to allow for exact pressure settings. edit: this is for a small

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! !
customer_reviews.text: Just received my 5×8 balazs bag and I have to say the rumors are true! Very nice quality, the loop is very thick, comparable to a cleto reyes loop. With 3psi it is faster than all my title bags at 4psi. It's also comparable to the speed of a cleto reyes but more shaped like a title classic. It's weight is comparable to hitting a 7×10 bag. You need to hit this 5×8 alot harder than a title 5×8. It also came with a pocket pressure Guage which was a nice surprise. Very excited to start hitting this bag on a regular basis. I probably won't switch out for a while.

customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely satisfied with my purchase. It rebounds perfectly. Well built. I routinely hit it hard and only have to air it up every two weeks or so.

I usually wrap my hands if I'm going to be hitting the bag for a long session but not with this bad, there is no need. Excellent accuracy, speed, and overall quality.

product_meta.title: Balazs Lazer Speed Bag
product_meta.description: The Balazs Lazer Bags are the best - in every detail, in every way, - you gotta try one, but only if “Your Serious”. Start with the sizes, Peanut, Small, Medium, and Large, - no having to pick which one because what you want is not available in your size - the Balazs Lazer Bags are available in all sizes - no nonsense. The connection is - Kevlar !!, double layered, perfectly centered, triple stitched Loop! No shortcuts here to throw the balance off. On the bag itself - the highest quality hand selected Smooth Grained Leather is all we ever use - smooth on your hands, but not slippery. The Fill Valve is perfectly centered and mounted to its own perfectly symmetrical leather panel !! - for perfect balance - no fill valves conveniently stuck in a piece of side panel here - this bag will not wobble. Check out the Lazer Shape - it’s perfect and symmetrical - no short necks, then long necks, one looking like a water drip and the next looking like an upside-down carnival balloon. The Balazs Lazer Bag is perfection at it’s best - with no equal. There are No Laces to throw a bag out of balance - but if your bag blows a bladder, you gotta have laces to service it right? The Balazs Lazer Bags have no laces because we want perfect balance, and the Air Chamber never pops and never needs to be replaced. You’ll Add Air to it, but it will not pop. One other thing - No Welting to throw off the balance - no welting to rough up your hands. Others add welting because they have to stitch the long panels to the short panels somehow. The Balazs Lazer Bag is designed with all separate Panels of the exact same size for perfect balance, and we die-stamp them for consistency - panel to panel to panel to panel - they’ll all be the same.
